### Generate dataset
set.seed(88)

M <- 10
mc <- 5
mt <- 5
average_samples_in_each_cluster <- 100
samples_per_cluster <- rpois(M, 100)
mean_per_cluster <- rnorm(M, mean=100+samples_per_cluster*0.1, sd=10)
